articles.description: With the onset of the pandemic, people have been tackling the different challenges brought on by the novel coronavirus. The invisible yet deadly virus has not only been hard to detect, but has disrupted the lives of millions of people in various ways.

articles.title: New COVID-19 strain detected in King County, health officials say - KOMO News
articles.description: Public health officials said Friday evening the new COVID-19 variant was detected in King County, after surfacing in Snohomish and Pierce County.  Health officials said the new strain of coronavirus, also known as "B1117," spreads more easily than others, all…
